LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueNeedle.label: plague needle
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueNeedle.description: A simple knife, with a thin but long blade for its size. This is coated with poison that inflicts the Mechanite Plague, but it tends to be inconsistent in its application.
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueClaw.label: plague claw
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueClaw.description: A lightweight sword that's been coated with poison that causes the Mechanite Plague. It swings fast, but its damage leaves something to be desired.
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueClaw.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueClaw.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueClaw.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueFang.label: plague fang
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueFang.description: An especially heavy lance who's tip has been coated with a poison that causes the Mechanite Plague. It'll apply a frankly ridiculous dosage of the plague per hit, but it's slow and unwieldy.
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueFang.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.MP_MeleeWeapon_PlagueFang.tools.1.label: point
